arts.ttl: Imminent Plymouth decision hints at another reason behind Wayne Rooney sacking
arts.sum: Wayne Rooney was sacked by bottom-of-the-table Plymouth Argyle on New Year's Eve, with the ex-Manchester United and England captain likely to be followed by a key ally

arts.ttl: Managerless Plymouth snatch dramatic point in first game after Wayne Rooney departure
arts.sum: Plymouth 2-2 Bristol City: Julio Pleguezuelo acrobatically turned home in stoppage time to earn a draw

arts.ttl: 'Humble & popular but no plan B' - The inside story of Rooney at Plymouth
arts.sum: As Wayne Rooney leaves his latest managerial role with Plymouth, BBC Sport looks at where it went wrong for the legendary striker.

arts.ttl: Bristol City player ratings vs Plymouth Argyle: Late goal denies Robins winning start to 2025
arts.sum: Bristol City Live is now on WhatsApp and we want you to join our community. The experienced head in City's backline produced some big interventions to keep the home side at arm's length and pulled off an excellent block to stop an early cross causing all sorts of problems.

arts.ttl: Plymouth earn late point in first game after Rooney departure
arts.sum: Plymouth rescued a 2-2 draw against west country rivals Bristol City in their first game since Wayne Rooney's departure as Julio Pleguezuelo scored a stoppage-time equaliser.

arts.ttl: QPR sink Watford as Argyle dig out last-gasp leveller to deny Bristol City
arts.sum: Michael Frey sparks 3-1 victory for QPR at Loftus Road Plymouth claim 2-2 draw in first game since Rooney exit QPR continued their march up the Championship table under Mart√≠ Cifuentes as Michael Frey announced his return to the side after injury with a goal in a 3-1 win over Watford at Loftus Road. The former Schalke and Fenerbahce forward had been out since mid-October with a calf injury but made an emphatic comeback on his first start in more than two months with a goal to give his side the lead after only five minutes. arts.ttl: Rooney leaves Plymouth Argyle after dismal run
arts.sum: Plymouth Argyle part company with head coach Wayne Rooney with the Pilgrims bottom of the Championship.

arts.ttl: Julio Pleguezuelo scores late equaliser as managerless Plymouth earn point
arts.sum: City twice led, through Anis Mehmeti and Jason Knight.

arts.ttl: Plymouth left embarrassed over Wayne Rooney sacking as social media post goes viral
arts.sum: Wayne Rooney left Plymouth Argyle this week after just seven months in charge, but fans who have purchased the club's new 2025 calendar will be seeing him for a while

arts.ttl: Mark Sykes, Kal Naismith, Sinclair Armstrong: Bristol City team news ahead of Plymouth Argyle
arts.sum: Liam Manning has confirmed that Bristol City's New Year's Day clash with Plymouth Argyle will come "too soon" for Mark Sykes to make his return from injury, but insists the winger is "very close" to a comeback. Bristol City Live is now on WhatsApp and we want you to join our community.
